description:
Just as the http://anidb.net/ch53497 [Rising Gundam] is a sibling machine to the http://anidb.net/ch53498 [Shining Gundam], this GUNPLA was customized with the concept of a sibling machine to the http://anidb.net/ch53567 [God Gundam]. The weight of this ultra-fast close combat machine is drastically reduced from the base God Gundam.
Source: gundam.info
name: Blazing Gundam
